thread.section_title: AmericanFlags.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AmericanFlags.com | americanflags.com | 4 of 191
thread.title: Wade Moench

author: Wade Moench
title: Wade Moench
text:
I did some research on line to find a vender for our 8' x 12' American Flag for our place of business. After comparing various sites, I chose AmericanFlags.com to place my order.
The process of ordering was easy, and I received the flags in a timely manner, well packaged, and as described.
I would recommend this company for quality flags at a good price.
